definition[0]: an elusive person or animal is difficult to find or not often seen
example[0]: She managed to get an interview with that elusive man.
definition[1]: an elusive result is difficult to achieve
example[1]: She enjoys a firm reputation in this country but wider international success has been elusive.
definition[2]: an elusive idea or quality is difficult to describe or understand
example[2]: For me, the poem has an elusive quality.
